description: Use this plugin to edit the style of the Bubble-native Rich Text Editor. Edit all styles within the plugin settings.
name: Native Rich Text Editor Styles
plugin_instructions:
Edit all styles within the plugin settings.

For fonts, only use Google Font names (e.g., "Inter").

For variables that contain "(number)", only add the number - e.g., "14" instead of "14px".

For variables that contain "(HEX)", add the full HEX color code containing the pound sign - e.g., "#FFFFFF".
